author: Shadow_Crawler
title: Keychain
review:
Well, you can't say much about keychains (much less 56xx sets), but I'll try to make it clear:
Pros:
Cute
Rare beard

Cons:
None

I hung this keychain on my school pencilcase, so I played with it whenever the teacher is boring, especially in Biology classes :D.

May the Force be with us,
Shadow Crawler

author: hustla187
title: HO HO HO!
review: One of the most popular minifigures ever made, Santa is now a keychain. The white beard is also cool because it is rare to find and the Santa minifig doesn't come in many sets. This is a pretty good keychain overall.

author: Jcc2224
title: A Good Present for the Holidays.
review: This Key Chain is a Good Present for the Holidays, give it to your parents, children, this is fun no matter what! Get this for the Holidays, look out LEGOville, Santa's coming to town! I give this a 4 1/2!

author: blaksamu12
title: Ho! Ho! Ho!
review: Santa is one of my favorite minifigures of all time, and now he is in keychain form!  Since this is a keychain set, Building experience, Parts, and Playabilty are very low, but the keychain is only $5, so the value for money is good.  I really like the beard and red color on this guy, since it totally looks like Santa.  Overall, the keychain is 10/10 (for a keychain) since Santa has contributed to a lot of my collection. *wink*

author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Cool classic retro figure
review:
Opening;

This figure has a very classic vibe that I wish Lego would do more in their key ring line up .

The Minifigure-

The figure starting at the top has the bandana piece in red with the classic minifigure smile a nice big white beard and plain red torso black hops and red legs . 

In conclusion-

like this key ring , is a fun one as it is designed to not look refined or modern so I recommend it .
